list.historyEntry:
for making a bulleted list I am currently either using 1st method of 2nd method in createdBulletedPointText, which one is better? if you have a 3rd option also please provide.
Also androidx.compose.ui.text.AnnotatedString has some methods with name bullet withBulletList, pushBullet, withBulletListItem. instead manually adding the bullet in string, should I use above methods? if yes provide code for it
Do you want to improve the logic for ResourceCompose class to make more compatible with hilt and compose navigation?
